verses.verse: וְעַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> now שְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> Yet now hear יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> O Jacob עַבְדִּ֑י <S%H5650><s%> my servant וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel בָּחַ֥רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> whom I have chosen בֽוֹ׃

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עֹשֶׂ֛ךָ <S%H6213><s%> that made וְיֹצֶרְךָ֥ <S%H3335><s%> thee and formed מִבֶּ֖טֶן <S%H990><s%> thee from the womb יַעְזְרֶ֑ךָּ <S%H5826><s%> [which] will help אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> thee Fear עַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> my servant יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> not O Jacob וִישֻׁר֖וּן <S%H3484><s%> and thou Jesurun בָּחַ֥רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> whom I have chosen בֽוֹ׃

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶצָּק־ <S%H3332><s%> For I will pour מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> water עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on צָמֵ֔א <S%H6771><s%> upon him that is thirsty וְנֹזְלִ֖ים <S%H5140><s%> and floods עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יַבָּשָׁ֑ה <S%H3004><s%> upon the dry ground אֶצֹּ֤ק <S%H3332><s%> I will pour רוּחִי֙ <S%H7307><s%> my spirit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <S%H2233><s%> upon thy seed וּבִרְכָתִ֖י <S%H1293><s%> and my blessing עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on צֶאֱצָאֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6631><s%> upon thine offspring

וְצָמְח֖וּ <S%H6779><s%> And they shall spring up בְּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> [as] among חָצִ֑יר <S%H2682><s%> the grass כַּעֲרָבִ֖ים <S%H6155><s%> as willows עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by יִבְלֵי־ <S%H2988><s%> courses מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> by the water

זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> This יֹאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> One shall say לַֽיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD'S אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> I וְזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> one יִקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> and another shall call בְשֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> [himself] by the name יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וְזֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> and another יִכְתֹּ֤ב <S%H3789><s%> and another shall subscribe יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> [with] his hand לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וּבְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> [himself] by the name יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יְכַנֶּֽה׃ <S%H3655><s%> and surname פ

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the King יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְגֹאֲל֖וֹ <S%H1350><s%> and his redeemer יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I am רִאשׁוֹן֙ <S%H7223><s%> I [am] the first וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> and I אַחֲר֔וֹן <S%H314><s%> and I [am] the last וּמִבַּלְעָדַ֖י <S%H1107><s%> and beside אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> me [there is] no God

וּמִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who כָמ֣וֹנִי <S%H3644><s%> is like יִקְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> And who as I shall call וְיַגִּידֶ֤הָ <S%H5046><s%> and shall declare וְיַעְרְכֶ֙הָ֙ <S%H6186><s%> it and set it in order לִ֔י מִשּׂוּמִ֖י <S%H7760><s%> for me since I appointed עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> nation עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> the ancient וְאֹתִיּ֛וֹת <S%H857><s%> the things וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and תָּבֹ֖אנָה <S%H935><s%> and shall come יַגִּ֥ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> let them shew לָֽמוֹ׃

אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּפְחֲדוּ֙ <S%H6342><s%> Fear וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּרְה֔וּ <S%H7297><s%> be afraid הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not מֵאָ֛ז <S%H227><s%> thee from that time הִשְׁמַעְתִּ֥יךָ <S%H8085><s%> have not I told וְהִגַּ֖דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> and have declared וְאַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> and you עֵדָ֑י <S%H5707><s%> [it]? ye [are] even my witnesses הֲיֵ֤שׁ <S%H3426><s%> Is there אֱל֙וֹהַּ֙ <S%H433><s%> a God מִבַּלְעָדַ֔י <S%H1107><s%> beside וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> is there צ֖וּר <S%H6697><s%> me? yea [there is] no God בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest יָדָֽעְתִּי׃ <S%H3045><s%> I know

יֹֽצְרֵי־ <S%H3335><s%> They that make פֶ֤סֶל <S%H6459><s%> a graven image כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> are all תֹּ֔הוּ <S%H8414><s%> [are] all of them vanity וַחֲמוּדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2530><s%> and their delectable things בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> no יוֹעִ֑ילוּ <S%H3276><s%> shall not profit וְעֵדֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5707><s%> and they [are] their own witnesses הֵׅ֗מָּׅהׅ <S%H1992><s%> like בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> fail יִרְא֛וּ <S%H7200><s%> they see וּבַל־ <S%H1077><s%> fail יֵדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> not nor know לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> so יֵבֹֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H954><s%> that they may be ashamed

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יָצַ֥ר <S%H3335><s%> Who hath formed אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> a god וּפֶ֣סֶל <S%H6459><s%> a graven image נָסָ֑ךְ <S%H5258><s%> or molten לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> to no הוֹעִֽיל׃ <S%H3276><s%> [that] is profitable

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֲבֵרָיו֙ <S%H2270><s%> Behold all his fellows יֵבֹ֔שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> shall be ashamed וְחָרָשִׁ֥ים <S%H2796><s%> and the workmen הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> themselves מֵֽאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> they [are] of men יִֽתְקַבְּצ֤וּ <S%H6908><s%> let them all be gathered together כֻלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> all יַֽעֲמֹ֔דוּ <S%H5975><s%> let them stand up יִפְחֲד֖וּ <S%H6342><s%> [yet] they shall fear יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> [and] they shall be ashamed יָֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

חָרַ֤שׁ <S%H2796><s%> shapes בַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> iron מַֽעֲצָ֔ד <S%H4621><s%> with the tongs וּפָעַל֙ <S%H6466><s%> both worketh בַּפֶּחָ֔ם <S%H6352><s%> in the coals וּבַמַּקָּב֖וֹת <S%H4717><s%> it with hammers יִצְּרֵ֑הוּ <S%H3335><s%> and fashioneth וַיִּפְעָלֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6466><s%> and worketh בִּזְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> of his arms כֹּח֔וֹ <S%H3581><s%> it with the strength גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also רָעֵב֙ <S%H7456><s%> gets וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> faileth כֹּ֔חַ <S%H3581><s%> and his strength לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no שָׁ֥תָה <S%H8354><s%> he drinketh מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> no water וַיִּיעָֽף׃ <S%H3286><s%> and is faint

חָרַ֣שׁ <S%H2790><s%> altogether עֵצִים֮ <S%H6086><s%> wood נָ֣טָה <S%H5186><s%> stretcheth out קָו֒ <S%H6957><s%> [his] rule יְתָאֲרֵ֣הוּ <S%H8388><s%> he marketh it out בַשֶּׂ֔רֶד <S%H8279><s%> with a line יַעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> he fitteth בַּמַּקְצֻע֔וֹת <S%H4741><s%> it with planes וּבַמְּחוּגָ֖ה <S%H4230><s%> with the compass יְתָאֳרֵ֑הוּ <S%H8388><s%> and he marketh it out וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> and maketh כְּתַבְנִ֣ית <S%H8403><s%> it after the figure אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of a man כְּתִפְאֶ֥רֶת <S%H8597><s%> according to the beauty אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of a man לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> that it may remain בָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> in the house

לִכְרָת־ <S%H3772><s%> He heweth him down ל֣וֹ אֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H730><s%> cedars וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> and taketh תִּרְזָה֙ <S%H8645><s%> the cypress וְאַלּ֔וֹן <S%H437><s%> and the oak וַיְאַמֶּץ־ <S%H553><s%> which he strengtheneth ל֖וֹ בַּעֲצֵי־ <S%H6086><s%> for himself among the trees יָ֑עַר <S%H3293><s%> of the forest נָטַ֥ע <S%H5193><s%> he planteth אֹ֖רֶן <S%H766><s%> an ash וְגֶ֥שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> and the rain יְגַדֵּֽל׃ <S%H1431><s%> doth nourish

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> becomes לְאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> Then shall it be for a man לְבָעֵ֔ר <S%H1197><s%> to burn וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> for he will take מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> of them וַיָּ֔חָם <S%H2552><s%> thereof and warm אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also יַשִּׂ֖יק <S%H5400><s%> himself yea he kindleth וְאָ֣פָה <S%H644><s%> [it] and baketh לָ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also יִפְעַל־ <S%H6466><s%> yea he maketh אֵל֙ <S%H410><s%> a god וַיִּשְׁתָּ֔חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and worshippeth עָשָׂ֥הוּ <S%H6213><s%> [it] he maketh פֶ֖סֶל <S%H6459><s%> it a graven image וַיִּסְגָּד־ <S%H5456><s%> and falleth down לָֽמוֹ׃

חֶצְיוֹ֙ <S%H2677><s%> part שָׂרַ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> He burneth בְּמוֹ־ <S%H1119><s%> thereof in אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over חֶצְיוֹ֙ <S%H2677><s%> with part בָּשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh יֹאכֵ֔ל <S%H398><s%> thereof he eateth יִצְלֶ֥ה <S%H6740><s%> he roasteth צָלִ֖י <S%H6748><s%> roast וְיִשְׂבָּ֑ע <S%H7646><s%> and is satisfied אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also יָחֹם֙ <S%H2552><s%> yea he warmeth וְיֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> [himself] and saith הֶאָ֔ח <S%H1889><s%> Aha חַמּוֹתִ֖י <S%H2552><s%> I am warm רָאִ֥יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I have seen אֽוּר׃ <S%H217><s%> the fire

וּשְׁאֵ֣רִית֔וֹ <S%H7611><s%> And the residue לְאֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> a god עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> thereof he maketh לְפִסְל֑וֹ <S%H6459><s%> [even] his graven image [יִסְגֹּוד־ כ] (יִסְגָּד־ <S%H5456><s%> falls ל֤וֹ <S%H5456><s%> he falleth down ק) וְיִשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <S%H7812><s%> unto it and worshippeth וְיִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <S%H6419><s%> [it] and prayeth אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to וְיֹאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> unto it and saith הַצִּילֵ֔נִי <S%H5337><s%> Deliver כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵלִ֖י <S%H410><s%> me for thou [art] my god אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> They have not known וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יָבִ֑ינוּ <S%H995><s%> nor understood כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for טַ֤ח <S%H2902><s%> for he hath shut מֵֽרְאוֹת֙ <S%H7200><s%> that they cannot see עֵֽינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> their eyes מֵהַשְׂכִּ֖יל <S%H7919><s%> that they cannot understand לִבֹּתָֽם׃ <S%H3826><s%> [and] their hearts

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> And none considereth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in לִבּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart וְלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> nor דַ֥עַת <S%H1847><s%> neither [is there] knowledge וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תְבוּנָה֮ <S%H8394><s%> nor understanding לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> to say חֶצְי֞וֹ <S%H2677><s%> part שָׂרַ֣פְתִּי <S%H8313><s%> I have burned בְמוֹ־ <S%H1119><s%> of it in אֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire וְ֠אַף <S%H637><s%> and also אָפִ֤יתִי <S%H644><s%> yea also I have baked עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over גֶּחָלָיו֙ <S%H1513><s%> upon the coals לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread אֶצְלֶ֥ה <S%H6740><s%> thereof I have roasted בָשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh וְאֹכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> and eaten וְיִתְרוֹ֙ <S%H3499><s%> the residue לְתוֹעֵבָ֣ה <S%H8441><s%> an abomination אֶעֱשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> [it] and shall I make לְב֥וּל <S%H944><s%> to the stock עֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> of wood אֶסְגּֽוֹד׃ <S%H5456><s%> fall

רֹעֶ֣ה <S%H7462><s%> He feedeth אֵ֔פֶר <S%H665><s%> on ashes לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> heart הוּתַ֖ל <S%H2048><s%> a deceived הִטָּ֑הוּ <S%H5186><s%> hath turned him aside וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יַצִּ֤יל <S%H5337><s%> that he cannot deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <S%H5315><s%> his soul וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יֹאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> nor say הֲל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> nor שֶׁ֖קֶר <S%H8267><s%> [Is there] not a lie בִּימִינִֽי׃ <S%H3225><s%> my right ס

זְכָר־ <S%H2142><s%> Remember אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> these O Jacob וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עַבְדִּי־ <S%H5650><s%> for thou [art] my servant אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> I יְצַרְתִּ֤יךָ <S%H3335><s%> I have formed עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> thee thou [art] my servant לִי֙ אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> O יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִנָּשֵֽׁנִי׃ <S%H5382><s%> thou shalt not be forgotten

מָחִ֤יתִי <S%H4229><s%> I have blotted out כָעָב֙ <S%H5645><s%> as a thick cloud פְּשָׁעֶ֔יךָ <S%H6588><s%> thy transgressions וְכֶעָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> and as a cloud חַטֹּאותֶ֑יךָ <S%H2403><s%> thy sins שׁוּבָ֥ה <S%H7725><s%> return אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for גְאַלְתִּֽיךָ׃ <S%H1350><s%> unto me for I have redeemed

רָנּ֨וּ <S%H7442><s%> Sing שָׁמַ֜יִם <S%H8064><s%> O ye heavens כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> hath done יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God הָרִ֙יעוּ֙ <S%H7321><s%> [it] shout תַּחְתִּיּ֣וֹת <S%H8482><s%> ye lower parts אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth פִּצְח֤וּ <S%H6476><s%> break forth הָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> ye mountains רִנָּ֔ה <S%H7440><s%> into singing יַ֖עַר <S%H3293><s%> O forest וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> and every tree בּ֑וֹ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָאַ֤ל <S%H1350><s%> hath redeemed יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וּבְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> himself in Israel יִתְפָּאָֽר׃ <S%H6286><s%> and glorified פ

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD גֹּאֲלֶ֔ךָ <S%H1350><s%> thy redeemer וְיֹצֶרְךָ֖ <S%H3335><s%> and he that formed מִבָּ֑טֶן <S%H990><s%> thee from the womb אָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> I יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD עֹ֣שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> that maketh כֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> of all נֹטֶ֤ה <S%H5186><s%> all [things] that stretcheth forth שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> the heavens לְבַדִּ֔י <S%H905><s%> Myself רֹקַ֥ע <S%H7554><s%> alone that spreadeth abroad הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth [מִי <S%H4325><s%> waste כ] [אִתִּי כ] (מֵאִתִּֽי׃ <S%H854><s%> for ק)

מֵפֵר֙ <S%H6565><s%> That frustrateth אֹת֣וֹת <S%H226><s%> the tokens בַּדִּ֔ים <S%H907><s%> of the liars וְקֹסְמִ֖ים <S%H7080><s%> and maketh diviners יְהוֹלֵ֑ל <S%H1984><s%> mad מֵשִׁ֧יב <S%H7725><s%> that turneth חֲכָמִ֛ים <S%H2450><s%> wise אָח֖וֹר <S%H268><s%> [men] backward וְדַעְתָּ֥ם <S%H1847><s%> and maketh their knowledge יְשַׂכֵּֽל׃ <S%H5528><s%> foolish

מֵקִים֙ <S%H6965><s%> That confirmeth דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> the word עַבְדּ֔וֹ <S%H5650><s%> of his servant וַעֲצַ֥ת <S%H6098><s%> the counsel מַלְאָכָ֖יו <S%H4397><s%> of his messengers יַשְׁלִ֑ים <S%H7999><s%> and performeth הָאֹמֵ֨ר <S%H559><s%> that saith לִירוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem תּוּשָׁ֗ב <S%H3427><s%> Thou shalt be inhabited וּלְעָרֵ֤י <S%H5892><s%> and to the cities יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah תִּבָּנֶ֔ינָה <S%H1129><s%> Ye shall be built וְחָרְבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H2723><s%> the decayed places אֲקוֹמֵֽם׃ <S%H6965><s%> and I will raise up
הָאֹמֵ֥ר <S%H559><s%> That saith לַצּוּלָ֖ה <S%H6683><s%> to the deep חֳרָ֑בִי <S%H2717><s%> Be dry וְנַהֲרֹתַ֖יִךְ <S%H5104><s%> thy rivers אוֹבִֽישׁ׃ <S%H3001><s%> and I will dry up

הָאֹמֵ֤ר <S%H559><s%> That saith לְכ֙וֹרֶשׁ֙ <S%H3566><s%> of Cyrus רֹעִ֔י <S%H7473><s%> shipherd וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֶפְצִ֖י <S%H2656><s%> all my pleasure יַשְׁלִ֑ם <S%H7999><s%> and shall perform וְלֵאמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> even saying לִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem תִּבָּנֶ֔ה <S%H1129><s%> Thou shalt be built וְהֵיכָ֖ל <S%H1964><s%> and to the temple תִּוָּסֵֽד׃ <S%H3245><s%> Thy foundation shall be laid ס
